rss.channel:
The John and Wayne Show http://www.airpoppins.com/rss.xml Welcome to a mixed dimension of music, humor and the occassional brilliant thought. All this from the middle of America - Oklahoma! It's OK damn it! This isn't a show for those easily put off by the f-bomb, c-bomb, shytacki-bomb and, of course, the a-bomb. That's right, you heard us Korea! Thanks for listening, it really means a lot. No, seriously....hey, don't go. en-en Easypodcast - www.easypodcast.com 180 http://www.johnandwayneshow.com Welcome to a mixed dimension of music, humor and the occassional brilliant thought. All this from the middle of America - Oklahoma! It's OK damn it! This isn't a show for those easily put off by the f-bomb, c-bomb, shytacki-bomb and, of course, the a-bomb. That's right, you heard us Korea! Thanks for listening, it really means a lot. No, seriously....hey, don't go.
The John and Wayne Show ?
johnandwayneshow@gmail.com Wayne Evans and John Hoff
Yes
FINAL John and Wayne Show http://www.airpoppins.com/JOHNANDWAYNE_finale_0901-2011.mp3 Time for a change, best of John and Wayne Show
John and Wayne On the Way Out http://www.airpoppins.com/JOHNANDWAYNE_0831-2011.mp3 Cleveland trip cancelled. Tiara has a baby, like a boss.
Rackball City and Ed Win http://www.airpoppins.com/JOHNANDWAYNE_0816-2011.mp3 First show in over a year. But things are good. Ed Win is the musical guest
Teabagging isn't just for the tea party anymore http://www.airpoppins.com/JAWShow_0506-2010.mp3 We somehow manage to get a female on the show
The Most Interesting of Our Shows Ever http://www.airpoppins.com/JAWShow_0425-2010.mp3 Prerecorded and live at the same time. Confused? You should be.
Strip club talk with BR and the Judge http://www.airpoppins.com/JAWShow_0416-2010.mp3 Second show with the Judge and BR, an early morning rendezvous
Whats the deal with lipstick lesbians http://www.airpoppins.com/JAWShow_0328-2010.mp3 The Judge, BR and Justin join Wayne for a very entertaining hour
Midget wrestling is coming to Concho http://www.airpoppins.com/JAWShow_0309-2010.mp3 Extreme Midget Wrestling's Nasty Boy grants us an interview
John D in the house http://www.airpoppins.com/JAWShow_0223-2010.mp3 Biscuits and mustard -- mmm hmmm
Time to test out videopodcasting http://www.airpoppins.com/JohnandWayne-08-08-2009.mp3 Wayne sits down and tries a Heineken for the first time. Beasties talk and more!
First John and Wayne Show in two years http://www.airpoppins.com/JohnandWayne-07-28-2009.mp3 Eating babies is chic in 2009, Gene sits in for John
Drink more Maker's Mark http://www.airpoppins.com/JohnandWayne-04-19-2007.mp3 I'm all alone and sober, which means some actual value to this show for once.
